ygData.subject: Smithing for newbie 101
ygData.msgSnippet: I am erudite wizard, money is not a big problem for me .  I have 80 plat sitting there donig nothing and i am in lake rathe right now killing gnolls, so Skull
ygData.messageBody:
I am erudite wizard, money is not a big problem for me . I have 80 plat sitting
there donig nothing and i am in lake rathe right now killing gnolls, so Skull of
Jhen Tra and Runed Totem is easily picking right now. What i dont want is
having to hutn for equipment all the time. I was wondering ,can we buy rusty
weapons from NPC or can we sharpen the same rusty weapon over and over again ??
